title: Pork and prawn dumplings
description: These homemade dim sum are easier to make than you think - and so delicious that you'll want to make them every Sunday.
ingredients: 125g/4oz raw tiger prawns, shelled, de-veined and roughly chopped
1 tbsp Shaoxing rice wine or dry sherry
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
10 ready-made wonton wrappers (available from Asian grocers)
